intro: Cryptantha modesta, commonly known as the modest cryptantha, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the legume family, Fabaceae, and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to purple. The plant typically grows in dry, rocky habitats and is often found in open grasslands and sagebrush steppe. It has small, oval leaves and produces pods that contain several seeds. Cryptantha modesta is a perennial plant that plays a role in stabilizing soil in arid environments.
